comment: Smart Data Models - ExcELIN1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcELIN1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Static PI transformer fed excitation system: ELIN (VATECH) - simplified model.  This model represents an all-static excitation system. A PI voltage controller establishes a desired field current set point for a proportional current controller. The integrator of the PI controller has a follow-up input to match its signal to the present field current.  A power system stabilizer with power input is included in the model.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dpnf
contents.comment: Controller follow up dead band (Dpnf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efmax
contents.comment: Maximum open circuit excitation voltage (Efmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efmin
contents.comment: Minimum open circuit excitation voltage (Efmin).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks1
contents.comment: Stabilizer Gain 1 (Ks1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks2
contents.comment: Stabilizer Gain 2 (Ks2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: smax
contents.comment: Stabilizer Limit Output (smax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tfi
contents.comment: Current transducer time constant (Tfi).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tnu
contents.comment: Controller reset time constant (Tnu).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: ts1
contents.comment: Stabilizer Phase Lag Time Constant (Ts1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: ts2
contents.comment: Stabilizer Filter Time Constant (Ts2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tsw
contents.comment: Stabilizer parameters (Tsw).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: vpi
contents.comment: Current controller gain (Vpi).  Typical Value = 12.45. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vpnf
contents.comment: Controller follow up gain (Vpnf).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vpu
contents.comment: Voltage controller proportional gain (Vpu).  Typical Value = 34.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xe
contents.comment: Excitation transformer effective reactance (Xe) (>=0).  Xe represents the regulation of the transformer/rectifier unit.  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
